content: Investing in Yourself | Temasek Polytechnic SHARE DIGITAL FILM & TELEVISION | SCHOOL OF DESIGN | TEMASEK POLYTECHNICS https://www.tp.edu.sg/ Singapore Budget 2024 Investing in Yourself In a forward-thinking approach to workforce development, Singapore's Budget 2024 has unveiled key initiatives that underscore the nation's commitment to lifelong learning and competitive career progression. * For most current and accurate information, along with accompanying terms and conditions, please visit Budget 2024 website. ITE Progression Award ITE Progression Award for ITE upgraders aged 30 years and below pursuing a Diploma qualification. a. Upon enrolment, top up $5,000 to Post-Secondary Education Account b. Upon completion, top up $10,000 to CPF Ordinary Account BROWSE COURSES SkillsFuture Level-Up Programme The SkillsFuture Level-Up Programme provides mid-career Singaporeans aged 40 years and above with comprehensive support to recharge their skill sets and remain competitive in today's evolving economy. Starting 1 May 2024, Singaporeans aged 40 years and above will receive an additional $4,000 top-up in SkillsFuture Credit (Mid-Career) to further offset out-of-pocket course fees for selected courses that have better employability outcomes. Part-Time Diploma/Post-Diploma Skills-Based Modular Courses PWM Courses (Security) SkillsFuture Career Transition Programme Hear from our Learners "With the new skills and knowledge, I am now able to identify opportunities to improve work processes, enhance efficiency and drive innovation in the Aerospace MRO domain. I am better equipped to advise on projects related to automation and collaborate effectively with my stakeholders. Continuous self-improvement has allowed me to stay current and competitive in my organization and industry." Na Wee Kwong Graduate of Specialist Diploma in Robotics & Automation "It has been an incredible learning experience for me at TP. The advanced manufacturing lab and robotic centre in TP provide learners with opportunities to gain hands-on experience in coding. The knowledge and skills gained have undoubtedly served me well in my career, as I am now able to confidently implement automation processes in existing workflows to improve productivity." Vincent Lai Graduate of Specialist Diploma in Robotics & Automation “My personal interest in the environment led me to the Specialist Diploma programme on Environment and Water Technology offered by Temasek Polytechnic.
